general.headline: Tech Lead at 99X Technology | Cloud Consultant | Speaker
general.description:
Manoj graduated with a First-Class degree in Information Technology(Hons) from University of Moratuwa. He competent consultant at Scalable Cloud Architectures, Docker Containers, DevOps, and Serverless. During his leisure time, he does a lot of hacking around Serverless and Serverless based development models. He continuously updates video content on Cloud Architecture on his youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/awsvideos 

He is a blogger at medium.com and he usually blogs about Cloud Architecture patterns - https://medium.com/@manojf. He also blogs at his personal website https://awsvideos.com 

He is the author of Serverless React Boilerplate (https://github.com/99xt/serverless-react-boilerplate) which got featured at Serverless repository (https://github.com/serverless/serverless). He has contributed to many Open Source projects such as Serverless Dynamodb Local Plugin, Pdf2S3, Serverless Delivery Framework and Serverless Dynamodb Localhost.

He is an excellent problem-solver, able to quickly grasp complex systems and identify opportunities for improvements and resolutions of critical issues with more than three years of experience in software engineering. He is adept in;
* Working closely with system analysts, engineers, programmers and business stakeholders to design solutions and to obtain information on project limitation and capabilities, performance requirements and interfaces. 
* Experience on Cloud Architectures, Serverless and DevOps and Event Driven Programming.
* Experience on Single Page Application Development with REST APIs.
* Performance optimization, software architecture and implementation coordination

Specialties: 
AWS Cloud Architectures, Containerization, Build and Release Automation, Web Frontend, and Backend development, Hybrid Mobile development, Agile/Scrum/Kanban/Lean, Angular / React/ VueJs

jobs.description:

If you want your own t-shirt with your own design, we can produce it for you and deliver it out in less than 7 business days. Our design tools make t-shirt designing easy and fun! So create your masterpiece with Customizerlk and experience the real difference of us. Quality of printing has been guaranteed over years and that is why we have the largest customer base in Sri Lanka. 
Printing customized T shirts is our expertized domain. We are offering number of categories of T shirts for you to customize. You can choose designs from our exclusive Design ideas or you can design it by your own. Print it with your favorite material and colors.

general.headline: Tech Lead
general.description:
More than 5 years of programming and software development experience. Seeking a challenging
software development opportunity in a dynamic environment where innovation, education and a sense of ownership are valued and encouraged.

Currently involved in iPhone/iPad and Android application development.
Vast experience in iOS 6,7 & 8

jobs.description:
Responsible for implementation and development of software systems and have an excellent understanding of the final goal and the customer requirement. Provide the team with a vision of the project objectives, communicate clear instructions to team members. Also Facilitate problem solving and collaboration and coordinate with internal and external customers as necessary. Familiarize the team with the customer needs, specifications, design targets, the development process, design standards, techniques and tools to support task performance. Assure that the team addresses all relevant issues within the specifications and various standards. Ensure deliverable are prepared to satisfy the project requirements and schedule. Keep the project manager informed of task accomplishment, issues and status. Escalate issues which cannot be resolved by the team and provide guidance to the team based on management direction. Assure that the team addresses all relevant issues within the specifications and various standards.
Responding promptly and professionally to bug reports and respond promptly to the requests/modifications/inquiries made by the client. Proactively assist the team to deliver the change requests. Assist the project manager for time estimations, during the project planning stage. Communicate the status of the tasks on a daily basis to the Project Manager during the scrum meeting.
Assist/guide/mentor junior programmers.
Document code consistently throughout the development process by listing a description of the program, special instructions, and any changes made in database tables on procedural, modular and database level. Tests new programs to ensure that logic and syntax are correct, and that program results are accurate.

Responsible for the technical development, debugging, and delivery of best- in-class mobile applications (iOS and Android).   Work across a wide range of projects, each with specific functional and feature requirements.  Collaborate closely with product managers, user interface designers, platform engineers, and multiple groups across CBS to define and implement product features.  Build high-level user interfaces using rapid prototyping methodologies.  Design application frameworks for use across the multiple products. 
Work with internal technical teams to identify and build platform elements required to support key mobile product features.  Evaluate opportunities to bring new product features and content to mobile users from a technical perspective. Build strong working relationships with coworkers, customers (internal and external), and company management

Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability. Work on bug fixing and improving application performance. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency. Implementing custom native interfaces using the latest iOS programming techniques and building reusable iOS software components for iPhone applications. Analyzing and optimizing application code for efficiency and performance.

allSkills: iOS, Swift, Android, Mobile Applications, Android Development, Software Development, iOS Development, Objective-C, React, iPhone, MySQL, Hibernate, Java, C#, PHP, AJAX, JavaScript, Ruby, Spring, Cocoapods, Java Enterprise Edition, Spring Framework, JSON, iPad, J2ME, iBatis, J2EE Application Development

jobs.description:
Project - Trimble Nexala Equinox

Working with Europe based development team in Transportation domain which provides software solutions for Major Bus companies in London, UK and Rail Companies in whole Europe. 
Asset Inventory and Maintenance System for major railways and bus services in Europe and Singapore.
Functionalities of this application include raising purchase orders, receiving goods, Asset administration, raising work reports, allocating human resources and goods to various task and sections of the company, maintaining user hierarchy and licensing, generating reports, issuing stock, etc.


Technologies: C++, C#.NET, MFC, COM, MS SQL Server

jobs.companyName: Sri Lanka Institute of Development Administration

jobs.description:
 Micros-Oracle Restaurant Enterprise Solutions (C++/C#.NET): Developing applications to be used in Restaurants. Compatible with Win32 devices, Tablets, Smart Phones and other hand held devices. Maintaining the current codebase, bug fixing and adding new enhancements to the projects.

 Sonic Credit Card Driver Development (C++): Developing a new credit card driver to support a new payment gateway added to the Sonic Hotel chain.

 Kitchen Display System Application Development (C++): Developing applications to run on Kitchen Display systems in order to display the orders rung from various places.

 VBS2StrikeDeveloper (Java): Developing d a Java API to expose the functions of VBS2Strike application.

 VBSMedia (C++): Developing an application to stream the VBS2 Game Engine’s UI to different clients. (Only HTTP compatible)

 RTSP Server implementation for VBSMedia (C++): Research and Development work to implement RTSP/HTTP support for VBSMedia.

 Mesh Simplification and Behavioural Changes for AIWorld (C++): Simplification of maps of VBS2 Engine and adding behavioural changes for AIWorld.

 SimVBS (C++): Developed a tool to emulate the behavior of VBS2 Game Engine without graphics.

 SimLogger (C++): Developed a reusable logger using C++ Boost library to be used in all C++ applications within the company.

 VBS2FiresDeveloper (Java): Developed a Java API to expose the functions of VBS2Fires application.

 VBS2FiresFusion (C++): Developed a C++ API to communicate with VBS2FiresDeveloper Java API.

 Traffic Light Module (C++): Involved in developing traffic light module for Pattern of Life Project.

 Mesh Decimation (C++): Implemented Mesh Decimation for maps in VBS2 Game Engine using VTK Library.

 RDA Southern Expressway Ticketing Solution(C, Java, JSP& Servlet, MySQL) : Implemented ticketing solution for Southern Expressway project. Barcode reading, NFC card payments, OTA data download and upload handled in the front end POS machine. Backend implemented using Java Sockets, MySQL and JSP.

 Private Bus Ticketing Solution & SLTB Bus Ticketing Solution(C, Java, JSP & Servlet, MySQL): Implemented Ticketing solution for both special and normal routes. NFC payments, OTA data download and upload supported.

 M-Token(C): Developed front end for Movie ticket reservation system in corporation with EAP movies and Dialog Axiata. Implemented in Savoy Cinema and MC Cinema.

 Touch Travel Pass(C, Java, JSP& Servlet and MySQL): Carried out initial Research and development of prepaid touch travel card to be used in Private buses and to replace the traditional season cards.

allSkills: Software Engineering, OOP, Design Patterns, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Programming, Machine Learning, Agile Methodologies, C++, C, MySQL, NetBeans, C#, HTML, UML, Servlets, XML, Android, Visual Studio, Microsoft SQL Server, Subversion, SQL Server, JDBC, JUnit, SQL Server Management Studio, C#.NET, Java, SQL
